data.title: Replay Core Reliability research summary
key_findings: Baseline and candidate are generated in same run by default; no canonical checked-in golden baseline path.
Replay artifacts are emitted into .replay-runs/<label>-<timestamp> with manifest/comparison/report outputs.
No replay CI gate is present in current workflow set (release workflow only).
Normalization already masks IDs/timestamps/paths and canonicalizes actions, but artifact portability and flake policy need hardening.
recommendations: Adopt versioned in-repo normalized golden baselines under src/test/replay/goldens/v1.
Implement CI gate wrapper with strict/warn/info modes using comparison.json.
Use CODEOWNERS + explicit baseline-update rationale for golden promotions.
Keep raw traces ephemeral and upload as CI artifacts; avoid checking raw JSONL into git.
